name: Void Guardian
description:
Void guardian is a game where you defend a powerful crystal from countless hordes of enemies

This game was made in under 72 hours for game jam 73: power.

In this game, you are the protector of a limitless power crystal. And you have to defend it from a misterious force of evil, which creates countless hordes of monsters.

Controls:

wasd: move

Left click: attack
